org.kepler.gui

Class KeplerSchematicContextMenuFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.vergil.toolbox.PtolemyMenuFactory
      • org.kepler.gui.KeplerContextMenuFactory
        • org.kepler.gui.KeplerSchematicContextMenuFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    diva.gui.toolbox.MenuFactory

    public class KeplerSchematicContextMenuFactory
extends KeplerContextMenuFactory
    A factory that creates popup context menus for Kepler actors, directors, etc.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 1.0
    Author:
    Matthew Brooke
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red

    • Method Detail

      • getOriginalMenuItemsMap

        protected java.util.Map getOriginalMenuItemsMap(NamedObj object,
                                                boolean isWorkflow)
        OVERRIDES PARENT CLASS TO SET isWorkflow TO TRUE get Map of name/value pairs containing menu paths of original PTII context- menu items, and their correspondign Action objects
        Overrides:
        getOriginalMenuItemsMap in class KeplerContextMenuFactory
        Parameters:
        object - NamedObj
        isWorkflow - boolean - @todo - FIXME - this is a gnarly hack because a workflow is actually a TypedCompositeActor, so if we just rely in the "instanceof" checks like we do for other context menus, this code will assume the workflow is actually an actor, and will display the actor context menu instead of the workflow one
        Returns:
        Map

      • _getObjectFromFigure

        protected NamedObj _getObjectFromFigure(diva.canvas.Figure source)
        Description copied from class: PtolemyMenuFactory
        Return the Ptolemy object that the given figure represents. In this base class, we assume that the figure is attached to a a diva.graph.model object, and that object is attached to the correct ptolemy object. In many cases, this is not the case, and you will have to override this function.
        Overrides:
        _getObjectFromFigure in class PtolemyMenuFactory
        Parameters:
        source - Figure
        Returns:
        NamedObj
        See Also:
        BasicGraphController.SchematicContextMenuFactory
